title: Mamoun's Restaurant
typeOfFood: Mediterranean, Catering, Middle Eastern, Mediterranean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of the Mamoun's family restaurants in NY and Ct, this one is low key and has been serving Mediterranean food since the 1980s. Many many veg choices, including the hummus, falafel, salads with pickled carrots and olives, babaganoush, etc., all made in-house from fresh ingredients.
